mapper.sql: ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME, PASSWORD, BRANCH_ID, POST_ID, MOBILE, WEIXIN_ID, EMAIL, STATUS, LOGIN_STATUS, LAST_HEARTBEAT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, RESERVER1, RESERVER2, RESERVER3, RESERVER4, RESERVER5
mapper.insert: insert into sys_account (ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME, PASSWORD, BRANCH_ID, POST_ID, MOBILE, WEIXIN_ID, EMAIL, STATUS, LOGIN_STATUS, LAST_HEARTBEAT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, RESERVER1, RESERVER2, RESERVER3, RESERVER4, RESERVER5 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastHeartbeatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserver2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserver3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserver4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserver5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update sys_account
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_ID = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIXIN_ID = #{weixinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_STATUS = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_HEARTBEAT_TIME = #{lastHeartbeatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER1 = #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER2 = #{reserver2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER3 = #{reserver3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER4 = #{reserver4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER5 = #{reserver5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_account set ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_ID = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN_ID = #{weixinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_STATUS = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_HEARTBEAT_TIME = #{lastHeartbeatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVER1 = #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVER2 = #{reserver2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVER3 = #{reserver3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVER4 = #{reserver4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVER5 = #{reserver5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.*, c.MAX_TASK_CNT from sys_workgroup_account a left join sys_account b on a.SYSACCOUNT_ID = b.id left join t_rule_member_taskcnt c on a.WORKGROUP_ID = c.WORKGROUP_ID and b.id = c.account_id where a.WORKGROUP_ID = #{workgroupId}

select b.* from sys_workgroup_account a left join sys_account b on a.SYSACCOUNT_ID = b.id where a.WORKGROUP_ID = #{workgroupId} and
and timestampdiff(SECOND,b.last_heartbeat_time,now()) <= 15
